parent_collections.title: Single cell RNA sequencing of retrogradely labeled mouse stellate ganglion neuron

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f3aek","text":"We performed plate-based single-cell sequencing as described in Snyder et al., 2019 (https://doi.org/10.1126/sciimmunol.aav5581)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":42}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"7A155C69D6E211EC8C8D0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://doi.org/10.1126/sciimmunol.aav5581"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fsg8v","text":"Pooled 3’-end sequencing libraries were sequenced on an Illumina NextSeq 500/550 platform","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"51kao","text":"The reads were aligned to mouse genome, GRCm38, gencode version M13 (Ensembl 88) using STAR v2.5.3a","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8klj0","text":"The aligned reads were assigned to genes using featureCounts v1.5.3.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c46l0","text":"bam files were sorted and indexed using Samtools v1.4.1, duplicated reads were removed and a UMI count matrix was generated using umi tools","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5u8qg","text":"We performed analysis of the count matrices using Seurat v2.3.4 in R v3.4.3 (R Core Team, 2013).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Single-cell sequencing and analysis
